verses.verse: And the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2320>months<s%>.

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H7080>diviners<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> to the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? <S%H3045>tell<s%> us wherewith we shall <S%H7971>send<s%> it to his <S%H4725>place<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, If ye send <S%H7971>away<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H7971>send<s%> it not <S%H7387>empty<s%>; but in any <S%H7725>wise<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> him a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>: then ye shall be <S%H7495>healed<s%>, and it shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> to you why his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is not <S%H5493>removed<s%> from you.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they, What shall be the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> which we shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to him? They <S%H559>answered<s%>, <S%H2568>Five<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2914%H6076>emerods<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5909>mice<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>: for <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4046>plague<s%> was on you all, and on your <S%H5633>lords<s%>.

Wherefore ye shall <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H6754>images<s%> of your <S%H2914%H6076>emerods<s%>, and <S%H6754>images<s%> of your <S%H5909>mice<s%> that <S%H7843>mar<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>; and ye shall <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3519>glory<s%> unto the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: peradventure he will <S%H7043>lighten<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from off you, and from off your <S%H430>gods<s%>, and from off your <S%H776>land<s%>.

Wherefore then do ye <S%H3513>harden<s%> your <S%H3824>hearts<s%>, as the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3513>hardened<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts<s%>? when he had wrought <S%H5953>wonderfully<s%> among them, did they not let the people <S%H7971>go<s%>, and they <S%H3212>departed<s%>?

Now therefore <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5699>cart<s%>, and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5763>milch<s%> <S%H6510>kine<s%>, on which there hath <S%H5927>come<s%> no <S%H5923>yoke<s%>, and <S%H631>tie<s%> the <S%H6510>kine<s%> to the <S%H5699>cart<s%>, and <S%H7725>bring<s%> their <S%H1121>calves<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> from <S%H310>them<s%>:

And <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it upon the <S%H5699>cart<s%>; and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, which ye <S%H7725>return<s%> him for a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%>, in a <S%H712>coffer<s%> by the <S%H6654>side<s%> thereof; and send it <S%H7971>away<s%>, that it may <S%H1980>go<s%>.

And <S%H7200>see<s%>, if it goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his own <S%H1366>coast<s%> to <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>, then he hath <S%H6213>done<s%> us this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>: but if not, then we shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that it is not his <S%H3027>hand<s%> that <S%H5060>smote<s%> us; it was a <S%H4745>chance<s%> that happened to <S%H1961>us<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H582>men<s%> did <S%H6213>so<s%>; and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5763>milch<s%> <S%H6510>kine<s%>, and <S%H631>tied<s%> them to the <S%H5699>cart<s%>, and shut <S%H3607>up<s%> their <S%H1121>calves<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%>:

And they <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> upon the <S%H5699>cart<s%>, and the <S%H712>coffer<s%> with the <S%H5909>mice<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H6754>images<s%> of their <S%H2914>emerods<s%>.

And the <S%H6510>kine<s%> took the <S%H3474>straight<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>, and went <S%H1980>along<s%> the <S%H4546%H259>highway<s%>, <S%H1600>lowing<s%> as they <S%H1980>went<s%>, and turned not <S%H5493>aside<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>; and the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>.

And they of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> were <S%H7114>reaping<s%> their <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%>: and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> it.

And the <S%H5699>cart<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, a <S%H1030>Beth-shemite<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> there, where there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>: and they <S%H1234>clave<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the <S%H5699>cart<s%>, and <S%H5927>offered<s%> the <S%H6510>kine<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> took <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H712>coffer<s%> that was with it, wherein the <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> were, and <S%H7760>put<s%> them on the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%>: and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
And when the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> it, they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> the same <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And these are the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2914>emerods<s%> which the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> for a trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; for <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>, for <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>, for <S%H831>Askelon<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>, for <S%H1661>Gath<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>, for <S%H6138>Ekron<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>;

And the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5909>mice<s%>, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> belonging to the <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%>, both of <S%H4013>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and of <S%H6521>country<s%> <S%H3724>villages<s%>, even unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> stone of <S%H59>Abel<s%>, whereon they set <S%H3240>down<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: which stone remaineth unto this <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, the <S%H1030>Beth-shemite<s%>.

¶ And he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%>, because they had <S%H7200>looked<s%> into the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, even he <S%H5221>smote<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H56>lamented<s%>, because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> many of the <S%H5971>people<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H1053>Beth-shemesh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Who is <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> this <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>? and to whom shall he go <S%H5927>up<s%> from us?

¶ And they <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> have brought <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; come ye <S%H3381>down<s%>, and fetch it <S%H5927>up<s%> to you.
